Control Name: 2.1.5 You understand how the choices and desired configuration of Azure services are managed.
Control Statement: Many customers govern service configuration through a catalogue of allowed services that developers and application owners must pick from.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 2.1 Have you identified and planned out the roles and responsibilities to ensure your workload follows operational excellence best practices?
